name: dynamic_programming_tricks
chinese_name: 浅谈 OI 中动态规划问题的一些解题方法
author: 曹立
complexity: Varies by problem; often O(N^2) or O(N log N) with optimizations.
summary: This paper explores various advanced techniques and optimizations for solving dynamic programming problems in competitive programming, focusing on mathematical insights, state compression, and efficient transitions.
